speak.voice: Welcome to the DP600 podcast, where we dive deep into the world of analytics solutions using Microsoft Fabric. I'm your host, Brian, and today we have a very special guest with us. But before we get started, I want to thank all of our listeners for tuning in. We appreciate your support!
Now, let's get to our guest. Joining us today is Emma, who works for Contoso and is an expert in implementing analytics solutions using Microsoft Fabric. Emma, welcome to the show!
Thank you, Brian. I'm excited to be here and share my knowledge on this topic.

Great to have you, Emma. Now, today's topic is all about implementing analytics solutions using Microsoft Fabric. It's a fascinating subject, and I'm sure our listeners are eager to learn more. So, without further ado, let's dive right in!
